column2: BRIEF-Valmont Industries Files For Potential Debt Shelf Offering May 15 (Reuters) - Valmont Industries Inc: * VALMONT INDUSTRIES INC FILES FOR POTENTIAL DEBT SHELF OFFERING; SIZE NOT DISCLOSED - SEC FILING Source bit.ly/2IGRAfr Further company coverage:
